UpdateRoot.testTitle: Time-Based Arrival Sequencing Optimization (AMAN system status)
UpdateRoot.testObjective:
This test verifies that SKYRADAR only adjusts arrival sequence positions when the AMAN system status is OPERATIONAL.
Conditions for automatic arrival sequence adjustment are:
1) The AMAN (Arrival Manager) system status is equal to OPERATIONAL.
2) The track is in ARRIVAL flight phase with valid time-to-threshold prediction.
3) The track is located within the Extended Terminal Maneuvering Area (E-TMA) boundary.
4) The calculated arrival delay is greater than CSP: AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD (120 seconds).
5) The track has an assigned arrival runway with active AMAN sequencing enabled.
6) The potential sequence position change would not violate minimum time-based separation (VSP: TBS_MIN_SEPARATION_TIME = 90 seconds).
- 1st step: AMAN status is DEGRADED, sequence adjustment should NOT occur.
- 2nd step: AMAN status transitions to OPERATIONAL, sequence adjustment SHOULD occur.
- 3rd step: AMAN status transitions to UNAVAILABLE, sequence adjustment should NOT occur.
CSP: AMAN_MIN_DELAY_THRESHOLD=120 seconds. VSP: TBS_MIN_SEPARATION_TIME=90 seconds.
All conditions except C1 are met for automatic sequence adjustment.
UpdateRoot.actionComment: Track KLM001 is in ARRIVAL phase within E-TMA boundary with 180-second delay. AMAN status varies to test condition C1.
UpdateRoot.actionDescription: Track is configured with all conditions satisfied except AMAN system status. Status transitions test whether sequence adjustment depends on OPERATIONAL status.

TestResult.resultDescription: Baseline: AMAN status is DEGRADED (condition 1 NOT satisfied), alert SHOULD be generated for manual intervention.
TestResult.nextActionComment: AMAN system status is transitioned to OPERATIONAL at time 8000.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: With AMAN status OPERATIONAL and all other conditions met, NO alert should be generated (automatic sequence adjustment occurs).

TestResult.resultDescription: AMAN status is OPERATIONAL (all conditions satisfied), NO alert should be generated (automatic sequence adjustment occurs).
TestResult.nextActionComment: AMAN system status is transitioned to UNAVAILABLE at time 13000.
TestResult.nextActionDescription: With AMAN status UNAVAILABLE (condition 1 NOT satisfied), alert SHOULD be generated for manual intervention.

TestResult.resultDescription: AMAN status is UNAVAILABLE (condition 1 NOT satisfied), alert SHOULD be generated for manual intervention.
